comment: If you can take her, take her! She's so sweet and really flexible with dates. It is busy work, but not hard busy work. There is always 3 things due every week: an assignment, assessment, and a discussion post. You also reply to three other people's posts. There is also a project you can do with a group which isn't too hard either. She's wonderful!

Dr. L is truly a diamond in the rough. There is no question that she deeply cares about her students & their success. She reads and gives feedback on everything & uses platforms such as discussion boards on D2L the way they're intended to be used (not as busywork). Attendance is graded, but she is very fair and only wants you to learn and succeed.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Professor Ledbetter is one of the few teachers who genuinely cares about their students success and knowledge. She is available at all times to answer questions, and during class, she created a space that was open to dialogue, questions, and comments. As a senior, she is one of the best teachers I have taken.

I took Dr. Ledbetter for Leadership and Gender, LDRS 3700. This was a 100% online course. Dr. Ledbetter in my opinion is probably one of the BEST professors at KSU. She is caring, compassionate and very knowledgeable in leadership topics. She is inspirational with her weekly module videos and is ALWAYS approachable and frequently answers emails.

Dr. Ledbetter is the best of the best. If you want a professor who genuinely cares about the material she is teaching AND her students, take a class with her. She gives incredibly detailed and helpful feedback and provides you with everything possible to get a good grade. Her classes are a lot of work, but I've enjoyed all of them.
One of my favorite professors. She offers a lot of extra credit and is very understanding. Tests and quizzes are open note.

Dr. L is the best professor I've ever taken - by far. She cares about all of her students and takes time to provide detailed and encouraging feedback on every assignment and discussion post. Class structure is super easy to follow, and she posts regular updates and reminders. Seriously, take Dr. L. Her classes will change your life.
She's caring and provides a bunch of extra credit. One of my favorites!

Dr. Ledbetter REALLY cares about her students. There are quizzes every week. Attendance is not mandatory. You can come to her for anything. She is one of the best professors at KSU! Please take her if you can. You will not regret it.

Prof. Ledbetter was amazing. This is my 1 and only teacher review, thats how much I recommend her. She cares, is helpful and gives a light work load. Class was discussion based. I suggest you chime in because it will make class a lot more interesting. Graded on attendence, easy weekly quizzes, an essay and a presentation on a topic of your choice.

Dr. Ledbetter is an outstanding professor. She deeply cares about Leadership and she genuinely wants her students to succeed. She is clear about grading and ALWAYS gives extensive,helpful, timely and constructive feedback. I had some personal issues arise during the semester and she went above and beyond to help me. TAKE HER! Don't hesitate.

I took the online leadership course and enjoyed it a lot. There are weekly quizzes and discussions as well as a paper, midterm and non cumulative final. She cares about her students and wants them to learn. The best part is you get 2 attempts on every quiz and test. Just read the chapter and it's an easy A!

Dr. L is a wonderful professor. This is one of the few online courses I have taken and she made it an absolute pleasure. She is attentive, caring, and clear in her expectations. She gives great feedback and is always available.
This was a four week course, and Dr. L would check on her students to make sure everything was ok, she was very understanding and gave extra credit as well. This was a four week course.

Dr. L is an exceptional professor. She takes the time to give good, positive and constructive feedback. Despite being impacted by the recent hurricanes, she is always up beat, still responding to our posts and seeing to it that we all have answers to our questions. Participate regularly in her class and you'll actually learn something useful!

Dr. L is a great professor. She grades on time and provides excellent feedback. Her class consists of weekly discussions on topics related to the weekly chapter and quizzes over the chapter. She allows unlimited time on the quizzes, mid-term, and final. Plus, you get 2 attempts on each. There is one major 4-6 page paper. Very sweet and caring lady!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Participation matters

comment: Dr. Ledbetter is the best! I took her online for a 7 week course, and I got an A. The material is very interesting, and the tests and paper weren't too difficult if you keep up with the work.  She posts a video of herself every week to reach out to the class and provide updates. Best online professor I've ever had! TAKE HER!
